author: Heather Snowden
title: The Best 'American Psycho' Quotes | moviepilot.com
text:
12 Of The Best 'American Psycho' Quotes And How To Use Them On The Daily (Without Sounding Like A Serial Killer) February 23, 2017 at 09:34AM By Heather Snowden , writer at creators.co 'American Psycho' [Credit: Lionsgate] By Heather Snowden , writer at Creators.co Staff Writer at MP. Lover of bad puns, nostalgic feels and all things Winona. 
Sure, Patrick Bateman might have been a batshit psychopath, chainsawing hookers, offing his colleagues and what have you, but for all his faults that #AmericanPsycho sure did bring the sass. And while normally identifying with this '00s movie character wouldn't be advised, when you read this selection of the best American Psycho quotes, I think you'll agree it's inevitable. 1. 'I like to dissect girls. Did you know I'm utterly insane?' [Credit: Movie Pilot] 
Whisper this when you arrive at the tail end of a long ass queue and wanna make guys scatter pronto. 2. 'I have to return some videotapes.' [Credit: Movie Pilot] 
On a Tinder date with a total loser? This solid excuse is your get out of jail card and will also ensure they never, ever contact you again. 3. 'I'm into, uh, well, murders and executions, mostly.' [Credit: Movie Pilot] 
When you've been listenin' to Marilyn Manson on repeat and your folks try to connect 'cause they're worried about you. 4. 'Do you like Huey Lewis and The News?' [Credit: Movie Pilot] 
When that annoying co-worker tries to make pre-coffee small talk. Best delivered while wearing a rain coat and your stinkiest side eye. 5. 'TRY GETTING A RESERVATION AT DORSIA NOW, YOU FUCKING STUPID BASTARD!' [Credit: Movie Pilot] 
Your BFF just dropped their phone down the toilet and you just can't help yourself. Probs need to apologize immediately afterwards, but it's worth it.
